description.summary: application interface to surface in ivi compositor

event.name: visibility

description.summary: visibility of surface in ivi compositor has changed

event.description: The new visibility state is provided in argument visibility. If visibility is 0, the surface has become invisible. If visibility is not 0, the surface has become visible.

description.summary: interface for ivi applications to use ivi compositor features

request.name: surface_create
request.description: surface_create will create a new surface with surface_id in ivi compositor, if it does not yet exists. If the surface with surface_id already exists in ivi compositor, the application content provided in argument surface will be used as surface content. If an other ivi application already registered content for surface with surface_id, an error event will indicate the problem.

enum.name: error_code

description.summary: possible error codes returned by ivi compositor

enum.description: These error codes define all possible error codes returned by ivi compositor on server-side errors.

entry.name: resource_in_use
entry.summary: resource is in use and can not be shared

event.name: error
event.description: The ivi compositor encountered error while processing a request by this application. The error is defined by argument error_code and optional error_text. If the application requires to associate this error event to a request, it can 1. send request 2. force display roundtrip 3. check, if error event was received but this restricts the application to have only one open request at a time.
